definition: flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
to have never met sb before (idiom); entirely unacquainted/a complete stranger/not to know sb from Adam
He who never wrongs others does not fear the knock in the night./Rest with a clear conscience.
pinyin: ping2 sheng1 bu4 zuo4 kui1 xin1 shi4 , ban4 ye4 qiao1 men2 xin1 bu4 jing1
containing_words.word: 平生不做虧心事，半夜敲門心不驚

sentences.english: I remember when the day of DYP's birthday came.
sentences.chinese: 我還記得在鄧羽平生日那天。

sentences.english: Life can deceive people, all this is big fast.
sentences.chinese: 平生無一事可瞞人，此是大快。

sentences.english: The time when I first met him was a very difficult period of my life.
sentences.chinese: 第一次見到他的時期是在我平生中非常堅苦的時期。

sentences.english: East wind on the high grass sleep, try to ask his life fine days.
sentences.chinese: 東風吹草日高眠，試把平生細問天。

sentences.english: She opened the first page and I heard poetry for the first time in my life.
sentences.chinese: 她翻到第一頁，於是我平生第一次聽到了詩的意境。

sentences.english: HereI will spread and share my traveling experiences one by one with you.
sentences.chinese: 這裏且將我平生的遊歷逐一道來，與諸君共享。

sentences.english: He held my hand as I boarded an airplane for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 叔叔牽着我的手登機，這是我平生第一次坐上大飛機。

sentences.english: For even if I cannot bear playing second fiddle patriotic ashes, and I am also patriotic.
sentences.chinese: 平生愛國不甘後人，即使把我燒成灰，我也是愛國的。

sentences.english: A rolling pin was used to smooth out the dough.
sentences.chinese: 擀麪杖是用來弄平生麪糰的。

sentences.english: For the first time in his life, Peter glimpsed the sea.
sentences.chinese: 彼得平生第一次看見了大海。

sentences.english: For the first time in my life, I was terrified by a beautiful sunrise.
sentences.chinese: 我平生第一次被美麗的日出嚇得魂不附體。

sentences.english: If a man wants to achieve what he wishes, Read the five sutras in front of the window.
sentences.chinese: 男兒欲遂平生志，五經勤向窗前讀。

sentences.english: Nothing better his life, see this heart is still.
sentences.chinese: 平生無所好，見此心依然。

sentences.english: When travelling, she preferred anonymous company.
sentences.chinese: 她喜歡同素昧平生的伴侶旅行。

sentences.english: It was the first time any of them had ever seen a joker.
sentences.chinese: 這是第一次他們所有人平生僅見的小王。

sentences.english: Usually, people will reach out and connect with colleagues whom they have never met or talked to before.
sentences.chinese: 通常，人們會設法和他們素昧平生的同事聯繫。

definition: life (a person's whole life)/in one's entire life
a matter for regret or resentment
a matter for regret/sth that is a (great) pity
different/unique/special/very/(classical) to behead/to die/to cut off/to separate/to surpass
did I ever ...? (or "did he ever ...?" etc)
the present age/in office/the current office holder
